description: Try our easy to follow Green Curry with Beef recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Green curry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Green Curry with Beef Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in pan, stir-fry curry paste over low heat for 2 minutes. Add 150ml of coconut cream over medium heat.
Add fish sauce, sugar and beans, stir & add remaining coconut cream & water. Bring to the boil, simmer until beans are cooked.
Add beef, chilli & kaffir lime leaves (if desired) and return to boil. Add basil if using before removing from heat. Serve with steamed rice.
